meanings.definition: Not included in the canon of scripture.
meanings.sent1: The uncanonical text was not part of the holy book.
meanings.sent2: The religious leader explained that the book was uncanonical.
meanings.sent3: The uncanonical story about a talking animal made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her uncanonical beliefs were like a colorful painting in a world of black and white.
meanings.sent5: The uncanonical scripture stood out like a bright star in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Not conforming to established rules or standards.
meanings.sent1: The uncanonical painting broke all the art rules.
meanings.sent2: His uncanonical behavior surprised everyone at the event.
meanings.sent3: The uncanonical fashion choice raised eyebrows at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her uncanonical approach to problem-solving was both risky and innovative.
meanings.sent5: The uncanonical design of the building was both chaotic and intriguing.
